title: What's it like studying biology in IISER for a PCM student? - Quora
tags: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research, Pune (IISER-P)
Indian Institutes of Science Education and Research (IISERs)

response.answer_text: Trust me , it would be really wonderful….You would really enjoy the beauty of biology in IISER no matter whether you have studied it in 11th &12 th or not.. General misconception about Bio is that it is all about mugging up. But, IISER faculty will never ask you to mug up anything here in bio. They will make you understand the essence of it and you would love it… I have many friends here in IISER Bhopal who are not from bio background but loves bio after learning it for 3 semesters as of now…some of them even want to take it as their main subject in coming years…Hope this makes everything clear..
